title: O&O.DiskImage Server 5.0 Build 127 (x86x64)(Murlok
description:
Creating images of entire servers is one of the standard measures currently taken by companies for protecting their data and system configurations. O&O DiskImage Server Edition takes this once step further by providing features that make your job as an Administrator significantly easier. Among these features are the network support made possible by O&O Enterprise Management Console and the new Job Assistant for time-scheduling a variety of jobs. Remote installation and creating images within a network can now be done directly from your workstation. What's more, forensic imaging for purposes of data recovery and the Start CD (which can be used even under defective Windows systems) are often the very last hope for your companyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s data when trouble strikes.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ One-click imaging New
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ E-mail notification of activities New
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Additional information bar New
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ TrayIcon to provide information on service and job status
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Also creates system partition images during operation
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ 1:1 copies of drives (cloning)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Advanced burning functions to CD/DVD/Blu-Ray/HD-DVD
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Works with Microsoft Virtual PC Disks (VHD)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Start CD with base operating system and system rescue tools
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Detailed reports
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Control and management of the local network possible*
*Only valid in combination with the O&O Enterprise Management Console

  OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7
